name: Experiencing the Vietnam War with Cpl. Michael Thorp
name_original: Experiencing the Vietnam War with Cpl. Michael Thorp
description: In this game, you will play as a Texas Tech University student who travels back in time to visit the Vietnam War. Through this time travel, you will get to experience all that Cpl. Michael Thorp has experienced while he was in Vietnam. Much of the interaction are events that Mr. Thorp has experienced himself and explained in his interview.
